Class SimpleCamera

Namespace
SzeneGenerator
Assembly
exerciseWithCode.dll

Free-fly camera with preset views and procedural spawn logic. Can position itself relative to targets while keeping them inside the view frustum.

[ScriptPath("res://Scripts/World/SimpleCamera.cs")]
public class SimpleCamera : Camera3D

SpawnRandomFromPreset(int, int, CameraTargetPreset)

Attempts to spawn the camera at a random valid position based on a preset, ensuring terrain bounds, visibility of a target, and optional line-of-sight.

public bool SpawnRandomFromPreset(int seed, int presetId, CameraTargetPreset focusPreset)
